message.raw:
* replacing bullet cmake setup, going
   * from bullet_dynamics_dirs, bullet_collision_dirs, bullet_soft_body_dirs, bullet_math_dirs
   * to bullet_include_dirs, bullet_library_dirs and bullet_libraries
 * added set ( FLTK_LIBRARIES and FLTK_INCLUDE_DIRS )
 * added gazebo_lflags so user can set things such as rpath while building gazebo-executable
